item.title: Podcaster Andrew Schulz Voted for Trump but Is Turning on Him: ‘I Voted for None of This… I Want Him to Stop Wars. He’s Funding Them. Reduce the Budget. He’s Increasing It.’
item.description: “Flagrant” podcast host and comedian Andrew Schulz is somewhat turning on Donald Trump after voting for him over Kamala Harris in the 2024 presidential election. During a recent podcast episode (via T
